doc.after: White settlers began to establish cotton plantations in Florida which required numerous laborers which they supplied by buying slaves in the domestic market By 1860 Florida had only 140 424 people of whom 44 were enslaved There were fewer than 1 000 free African Americans before the Civil War 18
